ruleBookInfo.author: [property="og:novel:author"]@content
ruleBookInfo.name: [property="og:novel:book_name"]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*\.com.*|.*本章未完.*|本章已完结|.*\.net.*|.*钢笔小说.*|.*一七小说.*|.*爱微小说.*|

searchUrl:
<js>
var r = {
	"sourl": "https://m.qbmfxs.com/",
	"type": "全本小说"
};
if (!String(source.getVariable())) {
    source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(r, null, "\t"));
    java.toast('\n已初始化，使用默认站源');
}
result="{{getUrl()}}search?kw={{encodeURI(key)}}&p={{page}}";
</js>
